Distracting Wound.name: Distracting Wound
Distracting Wound.flavor: You strike from the shadows, delivering a wound that distracts your foe and makes him drop his guard.
Distracting Wound.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Distracting Wound.target: One creature granting combat advantage to you
Distracting Wound.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Painful Puncture.name: Painful Puncture
Painful Puncture.flavor: Your weapon bites deep, leaving your enemy with a lingering wound.
Painful Puncture.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Painful Puncture.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Impossible to Catch.name: Impossible to Catch
Impossible to Catch.flavor: With practiced ease, you step into the shadows and disappear from view.
Impossible to Catch.effect: You become invisible until the start of your next turn.
